meanings.definition: To place or arrange in layers between other layers.
meanings.sent1: She interlayered the cake with chocolate and vanilla frosting.
meanings.sent2: The artist interlayered different colors to create a beautiful painting.
meanings.sent3: The chef interlayered the lasagna with extra cheese for a surprise burst of flavor.
meanings.sent4: The clouds interlayered the sky, creating a stunning sunset.
meanings.sent5: He interlayered the sheets of paper to make a sturdy collage.

meanings.definition: Having layers placed between other layers.
meanings.sent1: The interlayered cake was a delicious mix of flavors.
meanings.sent2: The interlayered rock formation showed millions of years of history.
meanings.sent3: The interlayered blankets on the bed made it extra cozy.
meanings.sent4: The interlayered leaves on the forest floor created a soft cushion.
meanings.sent5: The interlayered glass panes in the window kept the room insulated.
